title: @Riot Music Team, thank you.
body:
As the title states, I just want to thank everyone involved for putting together Swain's login theme. 

As someone who's been playing Swain for almost 4 years, I watched my friends play champions with login themes and well thought-out stories; and I was admittedly envious. 

But now? It's Swain's time to shine, and boy does the music pull at the heartstrings. I couldn't help but tear up when I first heard it. It's everything a simple main like me could ever imagine it being: stirring with power and dare I say passion. It's wonderful... It's simply beautiful.

Once again, thank you. Seriously. This is absolutely amazing.

Messages like this and knowing that the music could hold such importance to you is truly a huge motivating factor for me each morning I come into work. I try to pour as much love and attention into each theme I have the pleasure of working on. Swain's music, just like everyone prior to it, was a group effort & I had an immense amount of support from all the people on the team. To see that passion translate to a Swain main like yourself makes my day. So Thank YOU for posting!

P.S. Thanks Reav3 & Ed for the shoutout :)
